title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah: Swift Targeting and Documentation of Military Actions in Lebanon”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

In closing the loop: Identification of a terrorist and strike within minutes; Documentation of IDF strikes in Lebanon

The artillery division of Division 91 identified a member of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in the Itarun area in southern Lebanon. Shortly thereafter, an Air Force aircraft targeted the individual.

A short while ago, fighter jets attacked a terrorist guidance infrastructure of the organization in the Al-Khiam area.

Forces carried out tank fire towards a military structure of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in the Kfar Kila area, which was identified as a terrorist infrastructure of the organization.

Throughout the day, IDF forces attacked with artillery and mortars in the areas of Shuba, Kfar Kila, Hula, and Kfar Hamam.

Attached is documentation of the strikes: https://bit.ly/4bLHdBc
